Name: Manicure
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of apple wedge or slice..
Garnish with apple wedge or slice.
Review: Due to the use of Calvados and honeyed Scotch herbal liqueur, for a brief moment of madness, this riff on a Rusty Nail was going to be called 'French Nail Care' but thankfully this led to the name Manicure.
History: Created in 2010 by a collaboration between Emma Ramos and yours truly at the Cabinet Room in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Manicure contains 176 calories
